about_the_game:
Go on an amazing journey through locations in Slime Clicker! Lots of amazing slimes ready to conquer your heart and win your attention are already waiting for you.


Main features of the game:

— 15 unique locations;

— Spectacular bosses;

— 30+ different slimes;

— Mini-games;

— 6 types of weapons and their leveling;

— References and humor.

Slime Clicker is an exciting clicker adventure that will amaze you with its simple gameplay mechanics - just click on the slimes! Enjoy incredible journeys and cutscenes where each click takes you to new impressive enemies and exciting locations. Your character stands in the way of the destruction of cities by powerful slimes who want more than anything to destroy the existing civilization, your task is to prevent this from happening.

Prepare for epic battles with unique bosses that will test your skills in the realm of professional clicking. Use your ingenuity to defeat each enemy to unlock exciting new locations and game secrets.

To immerse yourself even deeper in the magical atmosphere of the game, enjoy various music tracks that have been created just for this fantastic adventure clicker. Each track guarantees complete immersion in the impressive game world and emphasizes the emotional background of each of your journeys.

Get ready for incredible experiences and a fabulous atmosphere of adventure in Slime Clicker!
